meanings.definition: Containing a ring structure with atoms of at least two different elements.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the heterocyclic molecule in the lab.
meanings.sent2: She learned about heterocyclic compounds in her chemistry class.
meanings.sent3: The heterocyclic ring was so unique that it sparked the curiosity of the researchers.
meanings.sent4: The heterocyclic nature of the molecule added a fascinating twist to the experiment.
meanings.sent5: The colorful diagram illustrated the heterocyclic structure clearly.

meanings.definition: A compound with a ring structure containing atoms of at least two different elements.
meanings.sent1: The heterocyclic was synthesized for further analysis.
meanings.sent2: Scientists are exploring the properties of heterocyclics in their research.
meanings.sent3: The chef jokingly referred to the complex dish as a heterocyclic masterpiece.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like a heterocyclic, full of diverse elements and ideas.
meanings.sent5: The treasure map led them to a cave filled with mysterious heterocyclics.
